channel.title: [PI Help] - SKILLCAPE SHOP PROBLEM - [PI Help]
channel.description:
SOURCE: Project Insanity
PROBLEM: If I have money in my invintory and I trade the skill cape shop it freezes the client and I have to restart it. BUT if I DO NOT have any money in my invintory and I trade the skill cape shop the shop works perfectly.
Right when I open the Skill cape shop( with money in my invintory ) the client freezes...
Please help
- thanks Grant

item.title: [PI Help] - SKILLCAPE SHOP PROBLEM - [PI Help]
item.dc:creator: @bassbx bassbx
item.description:
@bassbx wrote:

[quote=“help with my server, post:2, topic:371489”]talk to the wise old man at the warriors guild, oh and btw I just got off this server because I want you to go on and look spawn ags item 11694 look at the gfx its messed up, also the client does not have a class 8 file so you can’t add claws or any other items.
PS. if there is a code for claws tell me please.[/quote]
Instead of class 8 file the file is called ItemDef.java
Im useing the same source and i had trouble finding where to put customs at first.
As for the ags its probly just the base, i recomend useing sagi_X-evolution as a base.

Read full topic
